description: Cells is trying to resize incorrectly with the flavor 'id', not the API's 'flavorid'.
title: Cells is using the wrong flavorid for resize

comments.content: Cells is trying to resize incorrectly with the flavor 'id', not the API's 'flavorid'.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~belliott

commit 034df6e875d6c0b590f3cfb802574c2f982fd534
Author: Brian Elliott <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Oct 17 21:56:41 2013 +0000

    Make cells 'flavorid' for resizes
    
    Cells should use 'flavorid' (not 'id') for resizes.
    
    bug 1241222
    
    Change-Id: I57b997425f183f25d3ca032c7d8c35c1f49e3afc
